scripts.test: pnpm -C packages/engine test && pnpm -C apps/web test
scripts.coverage: pnpm -C packages/engine coverage && pnpm -C apps/web coverage
scripts.qa: pnpm install && pnpm -C packages/engine coverage && pnpm -C apps/web test && pnpm -C apps/web build && pnpm -C apps/web test:e2e && pnpm -C apps/web audit:lighthouse
